duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide prompt and courteous service to users as they call the Help Desk for technical assistance and support IS analysts in applications, operations, and software management.
Maintain inventory of software and licenses, install, maintain, and provide support for the software.
Assist users with available applications and programs, provide password support and manage access to the network and network folders.
Receive and document customer computer and network trouble calls, providing advanced technical assistance in resolving hardware, software, and system compatibility conflicts and malfunctions.
Maintain the fleet of laptop computers, load appropriate software and e-mailboxes for customer checkout, and provide administration and support for Remote Secure Access.

education_certification.credential: AA degree in a computer-related field (or unrelated AA plus one year of experience) - OR - High School diploma plus three years of experience
